title: ExtensionSpec: The ActorSystem extensions support should fail the actor system if an extension listed in akka.extensions fails to start

labels.name: failed
labels.description: Tickets that indicate a CI failure, likely a flakey test

milestone.title: none
milestone.description: For closed issues/prs that do not belong to any release/milestone
